languages.text: "Ой". {n}Идира натянуто смеется, глядя на обломки устройства на полу.{/n} "Кажись, правы ксеносы, когда называют нас неуклюжими животными. Ладно, раз уж решено..." {n}Идира бросает на вас взгляд, полный злого веселья.{/n} "Помирать так с песней. Ведите, Лорд-капитан!"

traits.locale_text: "Ой". {n}Идира натянуто смеется, глядя на обломки устройства на полу.{/n} "Кажись, правы ксеносы, когда называют нас неуклюжими животными. Ладно, раз уж решено..." {n}Идира бросает на вас взгляд, полный злого веселья.{/n} "Помирать так с песней. Ведите, Лорд-капитан!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Well, this is awkward." {n}Idira forces a laugh as she looks at the shards on the floor.{/n} "Looks like the xenos are right to call us clumsy animals. Oh well, since it's decided..." {n}She shoots you a look of vicious glee.{/n} "Might as well go out with a bang. Lead on, Lord Captain!"

languages.text: 「なんだか変な感じね」{n}イディラは床に散らばった破片を見ながら、笑いをこらえる。{/n}「どうやら異種族が私たちを不器用な動物と呼ぶのは正しかったみたいね。まあ、決まったことだし…」{n}彼女は悪意に満ちた歓喜の表情をあなたに向ける。{/n}「派手に行きましょう。指揮を執ってちょうだい、ロード・キャプテン！」
languages.original_text: "Well, this is awkward." {n}Idira forces a laugh as she looks at the shards on the floor.{/n} "Looks like the xenos are right to call us clumsy animals. Oh well, since it's decided..." {n}She shoots you a look of vicious glee.{/n} "Might as well go out with a bang. Lead on, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: 「なんだか変な感じね」{n}イディラは床に散らばった破片を見ながら、笑いをこらえる。{/n}「どうやら異種族が私たちを不器用な動物と呼ぶのは正しかったみたいね。まあ、決まったことだし…」{n}彼女は悪意に満ちた歓喜の表情をあなたに向ける。{/n}「派手に行きましょう。指揮を執ってちょうだい、ロード・キャプテン！」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “哎哟，这可真要命。”{n}伊迪拉看着地上的碎片，勉强笑了起来。{/n}“那些异形说我们是笨拙的畜生，看来不无道理。好吧，既然已经做好了决定……”{n}她看了你一眼，目光中充满了恶毒的愉悦。{/n}“咱们不如大干一场吧！带路吧，舰长大人！”
languages.original_text: "Well, this is awkward." {n}Idira forces a laugh as she looks at the shards on the floor.{/n} "Looks like the xenos are right to call us clumsy animals. Oh well, since it's decided..." {n}She shoots you a look of vicious glee.{/n} "Might as well go out with a bang. Lead on, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: “哎哟，这可真要命。”{n}伊迪拉看着地上的碎片，勉强笑了起来。{/n}“那些异形说我们是笨拙的畜生，看来不无道理。好吧，既然已经做好了决定……”{n}她看了你一眼，目光中充满了恶毒的愉悦。{/n}“咱们不如大干一场吧！带路吧，舰长大人！”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Vaya, qué incómodo». {n}Idira fuerza una carcajada mientras observa los fragmentos del suelo.{/n} «Parece que los xenos tienen razón al llamarnos animales torpes. Bueno, ya que está decidido...». {n}Te lanza una mirada de cruel regocijo.{/n} «Será mejor salir por la puerta grande. ¡Usted delante, Lord Capitán!».
languages.original_text: "Well, this is awkward." {n}Idira forces a laugh as she looks at the shards on the floor.{/n} "Looks like the xenos are right to call us clumsy animals. Oh well, since it's decided..." {n}She shoots you a look of vicious glee.{/n} "Might as well go out with a bang. Lead on, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: «Vaya, qué incómodo». {n}Idira fuerza una carcajada mientras observa los fragmentos del suelo.{/n} «Parece que los xenos tienen razón al llamarnos animales torpes. Bueno, ya que está decidido...». {n}Te lanza una mirada de cruel regocijo.{/n} «Será mejor salir por la puerta grande. ¡Usted delante, Lord Capitán!».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Nun, das ist jetzt unangenehm." {n}Idira blickt mit einem erzwungenen Lachen auf die Splitter auf dem Boden.{/n} "Die Xenos haben wohl recht, wenn sie uns ungeschickte Tiere nennen. Na ja, nachdem das jetzt entschieden ist ..." {n}Sie wirft dir einen Blick voll boshafter Freude zu.{/n} "Da kann ich auch mit einem Knall abtreten. Geht voran, Lord Captain!"
languages.original_text: "Well, this is awkward." {n}Idira forces a laugh as she looks at the shards on the floor.{/n} "Looks like the xenos are right to call us clumsy animals. Oh well, since it's decided..." {n}She shoots you a look of vicious glee.{/n} "Might as well go out with a bang. Lead on, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: "Nun, das ist jetzt unangenehm." {n}Idira blickt mit einem erzwungenen Lachen auf die Splitter auf dem Boden.{/n} "Die Xenos haben wohl recht, wenn sie uns ungeschickte Tiere nennen. Na ja, nachdem das jetzt entschieden ist ..." {n}Sie wirft dir einen Blick voll boshafter Freude zu.{/n} "Da kann ich auch mit einem Knall abtreten. Geht voran, Lord Captain!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira se force à rire en regardant les fragments éparpillés au sol.{/n} « Alors ça, c'est vraiment con. On dirait bien que les xénos n'ont pas tort de nous considérer comme des animaux maladroits. Bon, eh ben, puisque c'est comme ça... {n}Elle se tourne vers vous avec un air malicieux.{/n} Autant ne pas faire les choses à moitié. Passez devant, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, je vous suis ! »
languages.original_text: "Well, this is awkward." {n}Idira forces a laugh as she looks at the shards on the floor.{/n} "Looks like the xenos are right to call us clumsy animals. Oh well, since it's decided..." {n}She shoots you a look of vicious glee.{/n} "Might as well go out with a bang. Lead on, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira se force à rire en regardant les fragments éparpillés au sol.{/n} « Alors ça, c'est vraiment con. On dirait bien que les xénos n'ont pas tort de nous considérer comme des animaux maladroits. Bon, eh ben, puisque c'est comme ça... {n}Elle se tourne vers vous avec un air malicieux.{/n} Autant ne pas faire les choses à moitié. Passez devant, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, je vous suis ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Hımm, böylesi bir garip oldu şimdi." {n}İdira, yerdeki parçalara bakarken kendini zorlayarak gülüyor.{/n} "Demek ki zenolar bize sakar hayvanlar derken haklıymış. Neyse, madem akıbet belli oldu..." {n}İdira, sana zalim ancak neşeli bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Bindik bir alamete... Düş önüme Lord Kaptan!"
languages.original_text: "Well, this is awkward." {n}Idira forces a laugh as she looks at the shards on the floor.{/n} "Looks like the xenos are right to call us clumsy animals. Oh well, since it's decided..." {n}She shoots you a look of vicious glee.{/n} "Might as well go out with a bang. Lead on, Lord Captain!"

Neyse, madem akıbet belli oldu..." {n}İdira sana zalim ancak neşeli bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Bindik bir alamete... Düş önüme Lord Kaptan!"
